name: Freggy's Quest
description:
Hi! I am a beginner Godot game developer. Freggy's quest is a hardcore rage-inducing mobile platformer that took me 3 months to make since I'm dumb and had to always make changes. I just took a bunch of assets from the internet, I do not know if I managed to properly credit them but I least added their links in the credits.

Hope you enjoy it! 

P.S. I made the game so hard, even I cannot clear it lol.
